spell.name: Orb of Deception
spell.description: Ahri fires an orb in a line, dealing magic damage to all enemies it passes through on the way out, and true damage on the way back.

spell.name: Galaxy Shield-Blast
spell.description: Annie blasts a cone of fire dealing magic damage to enemies in front of her, then creates a shield for herself for 4 seconds.

spell.name: Enchanted Crystal Arrow
spell.description: Ashe fires and arrow toward the farthest enemy, colliding with the first enemy hit, dealing damage and stunning them. The stun lasts longer the farther the arrow travels.

spell.name: Mobilise the Fleet
spell.description: Aurelion Sol launches fighters, which fly out to random enemies and blast them, dealing magic damage and draining mana, then return. The first time he casts, Aurelion Sol launches 4 fighters. Subsequent casts launch all returned fighters, plus 2 additional.

spell.name: Traveller's Call
spell.description: Bard gains an additional mana each attack. Bard launches a meep onto his owner's bench which can be sold for 1 XP.

spell.name: Rocket Grab
spell.description: Blitzcrank pulls the furthest enemy to him, dealing magic damage and stunning them for 2.5 seconds. The next attack after pulling knocks up for 1 second. Allies within range will prioritize attacking Blitzcrank's target.

spell.name: Ace in the Hole
spell.description: Caitlyn takes aim at the farthest enemy, firing a deadly bullet towards them that deals magic damage to the first enemy it hits.

spell.name: Noxious Blast
spell.description: Cassiopeia launches her fangs at the nearest enemy that isn't poisoned, causing them to take damage over 14 seconds, and reducing the effectiveness of shields used on them by 50%.

spell.name: Dreadnova Guillotine
spell.description: Darius dunks an enemy, dealing magic damage. If this kills the target, Darius immediately casts again. Targets below 50% health take double damage.

spell.name: Chronobreak
spell.description: Ekko shatters the timeline, freezing all units in time before attacking each enemy with bonus magic damage and applying on-hit effects. Slows the attack speed of all enemies hit by 50% for 7 seconds.

spell.name: E.M.P
spell.description: Ezreal fires electromagnetic pulse at a random enemy that explodes on impact, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies and increases the cost of their next spell cast by 40%.

spell.name: Riposte
spell.description: Fiora enters a defensive stance for 1.5 seconds, becoming immune to damage and enemy spell effects. As she exits this stance, she ripostes, dealing magic damage and stunning them for a second.

spell.name: Chum the Waters
spell.description: Fizz throws a lure that attracts a shark, causing it to emerge after a brief delay. It deals magic damage to enemies caught, knocking them back and stunning them for 1.5 seconds.

spell.name: Orbital Strike
spell.description: Gangplank calls down an orbital strike around his target, dealing magic damage to all enemies in a large area for 2 seconds.

spell.name: GNAR!
spell.description: Gnar leaps towards his target and transforms into Mega Gnar, throwing nearby enemies, dealing 200 damage and stunning them for 1.5 seconds. While in Mega Gnar form, Gnar gains 750 Health and 100 Attack Damage and becomes melee.

spell.name: Smoke Grenade
spell.description: Graves launches a smoke grenade toward the highest attack speed enemy, which explodes on impact dealing magic damage to enemies in the area and causing their attacks to miss for a second.

spell.name: Tentacle Smash
spell.description: Illaoi slams a tentacle in a line in front of her, dealing 125 damage and stealing Armor and Magic Resist from each target hit for 6 seconds.

spell.name: Bladesurge
spell.description: Irelia dashes past her target, attacking them for a percentage of her Attack Damage as she passes through. If this kills the target, she casts again immediately at the enemy with the highest mana.

spell.name: Howling Gale
spell.description: Janna summons five tornadoes which fly forward in a large cone. Tornadoes grant allies they pass through 100% attack speed for 5 seconds, while knocking up and stunning enemies for 1.5 seconds.

spell.name: Ageless Standard
spell.description: Jarvan calls down his standard to a nearby location, granting nearby allies Attack Speed for 6 seconds.

spell.name: To the Skies
spell.description: Jayce jumps into the air and slams his hammer, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.

spell.name: Whisper
spell.description: Jhin converts each 1% of bonus attack speed he has into 0.8 attack damage. Every fourth shot, Jhin deals bonus % attack damage.

spell.name: Get Excited!
spell.description: Jinx gets excited as she helps take down enemy units! After her first takedown, Jinx gains bonus attack speed. After her second takedown, Jinx swaps to her rocket launcher, causing her basic attacks to deal bonus magic damage to all enemies in a small area around her target.

spell.name: Inspire
spell.description: At the start of combat, Karma bonds to her closest ally. Karma grants the bonded ally (or a random one if that ally is dead) a health shield for 4 seconds. While the shield holds, the ally receives bonus Attack Speed.

spell.name: Barrage
spell.description: For 3 seconds Kog'Maw gains infinite Attack Range, 80% Attack Speed, and his attacks deal 2% of the target's maximum health as magic damage.

spell.name: Cyber Barrier
spell.description: Leona creates a barrier, reducing all incoming damage for 4 seconds.

spell.name: Relentless Pursuit
spell.description: Lucian dashes away from his current target, then basic attacks them and fires a second shot which deals magic damage.

spell.name: Massive Polymorph
spell.description: Lulu polymorphs the 2 nearest enemies, causing them to hop aimlessly, unable to attack or cast. Polymorphed enemies take additional damage from all sources.

spell.name: Energy Shield
spell.description: Malphite starts combat with a shield equal to a percent of his maximum health.

spell.name: Chosen One
spell.description: For 5 seconds, Master Yi gains massively increased movement speed, heals for a percentage of his maximum health each second, and deals bonus true damage with his basic attacks.

spell.name: Indestructible
spell.description: Mordekaiser gains a shield that absorbs damage over 8 seconds. While the shield persists, Mordekaiser deals magic damage per second to all nearby enemies.

spell.name: Impact Crater
spell.description: Nautilus erupts the ground beneath his target, knocking them up and stunning them, and dealing magic damage. Enemies adjacent to the target receive half of this effect.

spell.name: Pop Blossom
spell.description: Neeko leaps into the air and slams into the ground, dealing magic damage and stunning all nearby enemies.

spell.name: Pop Unspeakable Horror
spell.description: Nocturne terrifies his target, causing them to be stunned with fear and dealing damage over the duration.

spell.name: Buckler Toss
spell.description: Poppy throws her buckler at the furthest enemy dealing damage. The buckler bounces back to Poppy, shielding her.

spell.name: Grand Entrance
spell.description: Rakan dashes to the furthest enemy within range and leaps into the air, knocking up and dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies.

spell.name: Energy Slash
spell.description: Riven dashes and shields herself, then slashes forward dealing magic damage. Every third cast, Riven leaps into the air and launches a wave of energy that deals magic damage.

spell.name: Flamespitter
spell.description: Rumble torches his enemies, dealing magic damage in a cone over 3 seconds, and reducing healing on them by 50% for 5 seconds.

spell.name: Deceive
spell.description: Shaco teleports and backstabs his target, critically striking for a percentage of his basic attack damage.

spell.name: Future's Refuge
spell.description: Shen creates a zone around himself for a few seconds, granting all nearby allies 100% chance to dodge incoming basic attacks. While active, Shen gains Magic Resist.

spell.name: Wish
spell.description: Soraka heals all allies.

spell.name: Unleashed Power
spell.description: Syndra pulls in all orbs on the battlefield and creates 3 new ones, then fires them all at the enemy with the highest health, dealing magic damage per orb.

spell.name: Satellite Traps
spell.description: Teemo scatters three traps around the nearest enemy. When an enemy nears a trap (or after 3 seconds), it explodes on nearby enemies dealing magic damage, knocking them down, and slowing them for 3 seconds.

spell.name: Temporal Passage
spell.description: Thresh tosses his lantern towards a random unit(s) on your bench, pulling them into the current combat and granting them and himself bonus mana. Traits are unaffected.

spell.name: Wild Cards
spell.description: Twisted Fate throws three cards in a cone that deal magic damage to each enemy they pass through.

spell.name: Fear Beyond Death
spell.description: Urgot fires a drill at the farthest enemy, reeling the first enemy hit in and dealing true damage repeatedly until they die when they reach him and reducing his mana cost.

spell.name: Final Hour
spell.description: Vayne focuses for 10 seconds, tumbling away from her target immediately and every third attack thereafter. Vayne is invisible while tumbling, and attacks after tumbling deal bonus damage.

spell.name: Assault and Battery
spell.description: Vi charges at the farthest enemy, knocking aside and dealing magic damage to all enemies along the way. When she reaches her target, she deals magic damage and knocks them up.

spell.name: Death Ray
spell.description: Viktor burns a path between the two enemies most distant from one another, initially dealing a percentage of max health damage, then 1 second later dealing damage in an explosion along the same path.

spell.name: Cyclone
spell.description: Wukong spins rapidly around, dealing magic damage to nearby units over 3 seconds. The first time Wukong hits each enemy, he knocks them into the air and stuns them.

spell.name: Deadly Plumage
spell.description: Xayah creates a storm of blades, gaining Attack Speed for a few seconds.

spell.name: Abyssal Bombardment
spell.description: Xerath transforms, summoning meteors to strike random foes in place of his normal attacks. Meteors deal magic damage upon impact and if they kill their target, all adjacent enemies take magic damage and are stunned for 1.5 seconds.

spell.name: Three Talon Strike
spell.description: Xin Zhao quickly strikes his target three times, dealing Basic Attack damage and applying on-hit effects. The third strike deals bonus magic damage and knocks his target up for 1.5 seconds.

spell.name: Last Breath
spell.description: Yasuo blinks to the farthest enemy within range and knocks them up, holding them airborne for 1 second and hitting them multiple times, dealing Basic Attack damage and applying on-hit effects.

spell.name: Contempt for the Weak
spell.description: Every third attack, Zed deals bonus magic damage and steals a percentage of the target's current Attack Damage.

spell.name: Bomb!
spell.description: Ziggs throws a bomb at an enemy, dealing magic damage.

spell.name: Sleepy Trouble Bubble
spell.description: Zoe kicks a bubble at the enemy with the highest health, dealing magic damage and stunning them.

spell.name: Infernal Chains
spell.description: Aatrox pulls some of the farthest enemies toward himself, then slams the ground in front of himself, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit.

spell.name: Five Point Strike
spell.description: Akali throws kunai at her target, dealing magic damage.

spell.name: Burst Shield
spell.description: Annie blasts a cone of fire, dealing magic damage to enemies in front of her, then creates a shield on herself for 8 seconds.

spell.name: Voice of Lightning
spell.description: Aurelion Sol breathes lightning in a line towards the farthest enemy, dealing magic damage and Overcharging all enemies hit for 10 seconds. If an enemy is already Overcharged, Aurelion Sol consumes the effect and deals 50% bonus damage.

spell.name: Emperor's Divide
spell.description: Azir calls forth a wall of charging soldiers from behind him, dealing magic damage to and slowing all enemies hit for 3 seconds. Enemies close to Azir are knocked back, while enemies further away are knocked up for 1.5 seconds.

spell.name: Dragonfire Pillar
spell.description: After a brief delay, Brand erupts the ground under the enemy with the highest current Health to erupt in flames, dealing magic damage to enemies within. If an enemy is caught in the epicenter, they are stunned for a few seconds.

spell.name: Unbreakable
spell.description: Braum puts up his shield for 4 seconds, reducing his damage taken from that direction.

spell.name: Rupture
spell.description: Cho'Gath ruptures a large area, dealing magic damage and knocking up all enemies within for a few seconds. Fabled Bonus: Cho'Gath additionally knocks up all enemies on the board.

spell.name: Fortune's Guillotine
spell.description: Darius dunks an enemy, dealing magic damage. While dunking, Darius is unstoppable. If this kills the target, Darius immediately casts again dealing 25% reduced damage.

spell.name: Pale Cascade
spell.description: Diana shields herself against damage over 4 seconds and summons some orbs to orbit around her. These orbs explode for magic damage when they hit an enemy, refreshing her Shield the final one explodes.

spell.name: Spider Form
spell.description: Elise transforms into a spider, gaining bonus Health. Elise's attacks in Spider Form heal her and inject her target with venom, increasing the cost of their next spell.

spell.name: Riposte
spell.description: Fiora enters a defensive stance for a few seconds, becoming immune to damage and enemy spell effects. Afterwards, she strikes, dealing magic damage to a nearby enemy and stunning them for a few seconds.

spell.name: Judgement
spell.description: Garen spins his sword for 4 seconds, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and reducing incoming magic damage by 80% over the duration.

spell.name: Bladestorm
spell.description: Irelia launches a storm of blades in front of her, dealing magic damage and disarming enemies for a few seconds.

spell.name: Eye of the Storm
spell.description: Janna shields her some lowest-Health allies for 4 seconds. Shielded allies also gain Attack Damage for the duration.

spell.name: Dragon Strike
spell.description: Jarvan IV throws his standard near the farthest enemy and pulls himself towards it with his lance, dealing magic damage to enemies he passes through, knocking them up and stunning them for 1 second.

spell.name: Counter Strike
spell.description: Jax dodges all incoming attacks for 2 seconds, then strikes all nearby enemies, dealing magic damage and stunning them for 1.5 seconds.

spell.name: Rend
spell.description: Kalista's spears remain in her target, each one capable of dealing % of the target's maximum Health in magic damage when removed. She removes the spears when doing so would kill the target.

spell.name: Death Lotus
spell.description: Katarina channels for 2.5 seconds, throwing knives at nearby enemies, dealing magic damage over the duration and reducing healing by 50% to her targets for 5 seconds.

spell.name: Divine Ascension
spell.description: Kayle Ascends, causing her attacks to launch waves that deal bonus magic damage.

spell.name: Slicing Maelstrom
spell.description: Kennen summons a storm around himself for 3 seconds, calling down lightning bolts on all enemies in the area every 0.5 second and dealing magic damage over the duration. Each enemy struck by 3 lightning bolts is stunned for 1.5 seconds.

spell.name: Dance of Dread
spell.description: Wolf mauls Kindred's target, dealing magic damage and reducing their healing by 50% for 5 seconds. Meanwhile, Lamb leaps away from Kindred's target.

spell.name: God Fist
spell.description: Lee Sin punches his target, dealing magic damage, knocking them back to the edge of the battlefield, and stunning them for a few seconds. Any enemies the target collides with during the knockback receive half the damage and are stunned for 1 second. If the target cannot be pushed back any further, they are knocked out of the battlefield instead, removing them from combat. If the target is still alive after being punched, Lee Sin will dash to them.

spell.name: Wild Growth
spell.description: Lulu makes a low-Health ally giant, knocking up nearby enemies for 1 second. Giant allies gain bonus Health for the rest of combat.

spell.name: Bramble Smash
spell.description: Maokai smashes the ground, sending forward a shockwave, that deals magic damage to enemies hit and slowing their Attack Speed by 50% for 3 seconds.

spell.name: Hallowed Ground
spell.description: Morgana hallows the ground beneath a random enemy, dealing magic damage to enemies over 5 seconds, shredding their Attack Damage.

spell.name: Wither
spell.description: Nasus withers the enemy with the highest percent Health, dealing magic damage over 5 seconds, and slowing their Attack Speed and Movement Speed by 50% for the duration.

spell.name: Impact Crater
spell.description: Nautilus erupts the ground beneath his target, knocking them up, stunning them for a few seconds and dealing magic damage. Fabled Bonus: Nautilus also grants himself a shield that reduces incoming damage by 60% for 5 seconds.

spell.name: Pop Blossom
spell.description: Neeko throws a seed at a random target that explodes for magic damage three times. Each explosion affects a bigger area than the last. Fabled Bonus: The third explosion is empowered dealing 300 magic damage instead.

spell.name: Javelin Toss
spell.description: Nidalee throws her javelin at her farthest enemy, dealing magic damage plus 20% more for each hex traveled.

spell.name: Consume
spell.description: Willump bites his target, dealing magic damage. If Willump's target has less Health than he does before the bite, it deals an additional 50% damage and becomes true damage.

spell.name: Ragnarok
spell.description: Olaf gains Attack Speed, immunity to crowd control, and his attacks cleave in a cone in front of him for physical damage for the rest of combat.

spell.name: Stampede
spell.description: Ornn summons an elemental from behind the farthest enemy to travel towards him, slowing the Attack Speed of enemies hit by 50% for a few seconds and dealing magic damage. If the elemental runs into Ornn, he headbutts it, redirecting it towards another distant enemy, stunning for 1.5 seconds and dealing magic Damage.

spell.name: Phantom Undertow
spell.description: Pyke leaves a phantom at his location, then dashes behind the farthest enemy. After 1 second, his phantom returns to Pyke, dealing magic damage to all enemies it passes through and stunning them for a few seconds.

spell.name: Disarming Diversion
spell.description: Rakan dashes to the furthest enemy within range, disarming all units he passes through for a few seconds and taunting his target. Rakan then creates a shield on himself for 4 seconds

spell.name: Inferno Trigger
spell.description: Samira dashes and becomes unstoppable, unleashing a few shots per second at 3 enemies within 2.5 hexes for 2 seconds. Each shot does % of her Attack Damage. For the duration, Samira gains 100% dodge chance.

spell.name: Firecracker
spell.description: Sejuani throws a giant firecracker at the closest enemy that explodes after a 2-second delay. Enemies in the explosion are dealt magic damage and are stunned for a few seconds.

spell.name: Showstopper
spell.description: Sett grabs his target and slams them forward, dealing % of their maximum Health in magic damage to them, and % of the slammed enemy's maximum Health to all other enemies in a large area.

spell.name: Shadow Dash
spell.description: Shen dashes past his target, shielding himself against damage and taunting all adjacent enemies for a seconds.

spell.name: Dragon's Descent
spell.description: Shyvana dashes away from her current target and transforms into dragon form. While in Dragon Form, Shyvana gains bonus Health, bonus AD, and her Basic Attacks become ranged attacks that deal bonus magic damage over 2 seconds on hit.

spell.name: On the Hunt
spell.description: Sivir rallies her allies within 2 hexes, granting them Attack Speed for 5 seconds. Sivir gains bonus Attack Damage for the duration.

spell.name: Draconic Ascension
spell.description: Swain transforms into his dragon form for 6 seconds, gaining maximum Health and dealing magic damage each second to enemies within a few hexes. While in dragon form, every 2 seconds Swain breaths fire in a cone in front of him, dealing magic damage, burning enemies for 25% of their maximum Health as true damage over 10 seconds, and reducing healing by 50% for the duration.

spell.name: Thick Skin
spell.description: Tahm Kench takes reduced damage from all sources.

spell.name: Truestrike
spell.description: Talon stabs his target, striking them for % of his Attack Damage plus bonus physical damage. If this kills them, Talon becomes unstoppable, and untargetable while he leaps to the lowest Armor enemy.

spell.name: Sporecloud Dart
spell.description: Teemo fires a dart at the enemy with the highest Attack Speed. The dart explodes into a cloud of spores on contact, poisoning nearby enemies. Poisoned enemies take magic damage over a few seconds and are blinded for the duration.

spell.name: Rapid Fire
spell.description: Tristana excites her Dragon, increasing her Attack Speed and dealing bonus magic damage on hit for 3 seconds.

spell.name: Spinning Slash
spell.description: Tryndamere spins in a line towards the most enemies, dealing % of his Attack Damage to enemies in his path and empowering his next three auto attacks to deal more damage.

spell.name: Wild Cards
spell.description: Twisted Fate throws three cards in a cone that deal magic damage to each enemy they pass through.

spell.name: Dark Blossom
spell.description: Veigar blasts the enemy with the lowest Health, dealing magic damage. If this kills his target, Veigar permanently gains spell power.

spell.name: Denting Blow
spell.description: Vi's attack blasts through her target, dealing magic damage to all enemies in a cone and reducing their Armor for 8 seconds.

spell.name: Transfusion
spell.description: Vladimir deals magic damage to his target. All nearby allies are healed for 50% of damage dealt.

spell.name: Crushing Blow
spell.description: Wukong slams his target with his staff, dealing % of his Attack Damage as physical damage and stunning them for a few seconds.

spell.name: Featherstorm
spell.description: Xayah leaps into the air becoming untargetable, invulnerable, and throwing out a fan of feather daggers, dealing % of her Attack Damage as physical damage to enemies within the cone. Xayah then recalls her feathers, striking enemies hit for magic damage per feather.

spell.name: Striking Steel
spell.description: Yasuo strikes forward two hexes, attacking for % of his Attack Damage. If he can't hit two targets from where he's standing, he'll first dash to a place where he can.

spell.name: Seal Fate
spell.description: Yone strikes along a path in front of him, dealing magic damage split between all enemies hit. Enemies hit are marked for death, reducing their Armor and Magic Resist. Yone's spell is then replaced with Unforgotten until there are no remaining enemies marked for death. Unforgotten (20 mana): Yone dashes to the lowest-Health enemy that is marked for death, dealing physical damage plus their missing health as magic damage.

spell.name: Zoomies
spell.description: Yuumi dashes to the lowest-Health ally, healing them for % of their missing Health and granting them Attack Speed for 5 seconds. She then repeats this on the farthest ally.

spell.name: Contempt for the Weak
spell.description: Innate: When combat starts, Zed teleports to the enemy backline. Every third attack, Zed deals bonus magic damage and steals % of the target's current Attack Damage.

spell.name: Rewind Fate
spell.description: Zilean places a protective Time Rune on the allies with the lowest Health other than himself. When they would die, they instead resurrect after a few seconds, returning to combat with some Health and shedding all negative effects. After resurrecting, they have bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat.
